snippet: The Rev. Al Sharpton organized the rally in Harlem to draw attention to breakaway Democrats who have said they would join with Republicans in the next state legislative session.
abstract: Rev Al Sharpton organizes rally in Harlem to denounce plan by Republicans and group of dissident Democrats to join together to preside over New York State Senate.
lead_paragraph: The Rev. Al Sharpton organized the rally in Harlem to draw attention to breakaway Democrats who have said they would join with Republicans in the next state legislative session.

headline.seo: Al Sharpton Leads Rally Denouncing Power-Sharing Coalition in Albany
headline.main: Rally Protests Coalition in New York State Senate
headline.print_headline: Rally Protests Coalition In New York State Senate
